评论概述: Comfiest piece of clothing I’ve ever ordered from Amazon!
评论详情: The material is so soft and comfy. It is the perfect thickness (it feels high quality, not too thin, but still lightweight). I am 5ft 3in, women’s size 10 and the size large was the perfect length and perfect amount of room around the legs and stomach while still looking structured and well-fitting. I have never purchased a piece of clothing from Amazon that I actually liked, but I took a chance due to the positive reviews and I love it! I hope this helps :)
True to size. Good for short girls.

I really like these sets for working from home. The material is super soft and the colors are true to the photos. They do look a bit like pajamas so I am not sure I would wear these sets out and about. My only complaint is that the pants fit a little weird in the crotch area. Maybe I should have ordered one size up to avoid this but the top fits great. Just be aware normal size may be a bit snug on the hips if you are blessed in that area

Really wishing this worked for me because it is very comfy.  However, it’s VERY short.  I’m only 5”3’ with extremely short legs and these pants were too short for me.  If you’re over five feet tall, these pants will be above your ankle bone.  Also be aware that the top is cropped, barely hitting the waste band of the pants.

I purchased this lounge set based on description and reviews. I am 5 1", 120 for reference. I wanted a put together, oversized, comfortable,  versatile  lounge set and this hit the mark. It's a great value as well. I washed it in cold put on gentle cycle and hung to dry. It dried without any shrinkage.  You can hang out at home or accessorize it and wear out for a casual put together look. I purchased 2 other colors.  You will ❤️ it!

I usually wear a medium but I ordered a large and it’s perfectly cozy without looking sloppy. Feels good, waist not tight, cropped but not too much. I’ll def order more colors. Haven’t washed it yet but will not dry all the way for sure.

评论概述: Ordered for fall travel and causal outings.
评论详情: Ordered size recommended. Nice color and material is quality. It is a little heavy for summer. Bought to wear on flights. I am 5'3 and the length is perfect.
Size and shape is great

Perfect, perfect, perfect fit! Feel so soft and at first i was hesitant as to what size cuz i am usually a medium and did that from another brand and oh my too large. Crossed my fingers on this brand and referred my size to the reviews here. So if you are 5’2” like me and 137lbs, SMALL should be your size. Thanks for all the reviews here.

Giving this set 3 stars mostly because the color is nowhere near what the picture shows. The army green on the model is a more vibrant color whereas the actual set is a dark green as shown in the pic. I’m 5’0” 6 months pregnant and purchased a medium. It did fit well and was still slightly large on my frame however based on the reviews i expect it to shrink a little in the wash.
It’s cute and comfortable but everything sticks on the fabric
The pants were short on me and I’m only 5’5” but it’s super cute and comfortable otherwise.

The waist was more snug than I had hoped so it gets uncomfortable after a while but everything else fit great!  I’m not much of a cropped top girl but there’s enough coverage…I’m only 5 ft…but I’d probably tuck a tank underneath if I wear it out ..just personal preference :) Pant length is great!! I was looking for cropped pants knowing it would fit me perfectly.  These hit just above the ground so they’re perfect.  Also, wow soft!! I can’t say how they’ll wear and wash long term but out of the bag…fantastic!  I immediately ordered another color.  Rust was more pink than I thought it would be…kind of salmon color.  Nothing was a deal breaker though so ordered another color!
Had to return.  Pants were fine.  Top way too big

I got the teal one because it was the cheapest. These pants are soooooo short. I’m 5”2, they hit right at my ankles. I’m trying to really like it because of the price. I got the medium, it’s a little tight on my belly. I’m 150lb I could’ve size up due to the length of these pants and the length of the sleeves. I gave it a 3 cause of the price, it’s more of a spring suit not winter.

I can confirm this loungewear set is made of 100% Rayon. I prefer loungewear sets made with nature materials. Cotton is the best, but rayon is a second runner up. Rayon is basically chemically processed cotton. The fabric feels like cotton, is soft, and has a nice medium thickness to it. I love that the pants have pockets. I’m 5’4, 150 pounds, and the medium fit great. I bought more colors :)
Nice heavy cotton set for petites! Washes well and will not shrink. 5’1 and wearing a Medium for a bit of an oversized look.
Comfy material, good length of sleeve and pants. Would only buy again for deal price

评论概述: Perfect fit, color, comfort. Note: it’s cotton not rayon.
评论详情: I bought this in Dark Grey, size Medium. I’m ~5’3” 140lb and it fits wonderfully. The pants are a bit long on me, so they could be hemmed but they work fine without. The cropped top is boxy and flowy, which sometimes allows a cool draft so I recommend wearing a shirt underneath in cooler weather.  My only real note is that for some reason, both the listing and the physical tag say “100% rayon” when it’s clearly cotton. Not sure why.

This is a really good quality sweatsuit. The fabric is there, so it would definitely be for the northern areas during the winter. It’s not a sweatshirt material that you would typically say, it’s almost ribbed as I try to share with my photo. I found the shirt a little short for my liking, it barely covered my stomach. I am returning it, but I think the younger generation would love it

I purchased this set in black and intend to layer the top over a white button down shirt. The set is well made, great pocket placement, soft small whale rib fabric. Cut of pants is lovely loose but fabric gives structure so the pant doesn’t cling to legs. Sleeve of shirt is slightly belles at the cuff but not obnoxiously. Just enough! Love it! Will likely purchase in another color to mix and match.

评论概述: Amazing outfit, color not as expected
评论详情: Love this outfit for lounge, errands, or travel. Super soft and medium thickness and weight so it is versatile. Unfortunately “rust” is really more of a salmon color.

As another reviewer mentioned,  Finally, something I don't need to hem!  This lounge wear set is very comfy, flattering, & the color is so vivid.  At 5'0 and 118, the pants hem hits right at my ankles/top of my foot, and I love it.  The crop top hem hits right below my belly button, enough to tuck a portion of fabric into the pants waistband.  The proportions are perfect for petite women to wear as normal, or as its intended as cropped top & cropped pants for taller women.  Definitely want the other colors now too.

Fabric is very comfy/wfh/loungewear vibes perfection. I wish you could order different sizes of the top and pants. I have a short torso, but long legs with thighs, hips & a butt. A medium top fit perfectly; a great crop length. But the pants were a tad shorter than I’d like and tight. Wish they were longer & more flowy, but the large top would have been too baggy for me.

This is super cute and well made. The material is  a little heavier and doesn’t feel cheap at all. But the pants are very short. I ordered the medium and I’m 5’2” and the pants hang above my ankles. Looks a little goofy with a wide leg pant. But the shirt fits really well.

Dream matching set for home, errands or travels. There’s a bit of a texture that makes it look more dressed up than jersey and more expensive. The quality is good. The material is thick but not heavy. I’m 5’0 at 125 and the S fit well. Even the length is perfect.
Way nicer quality than expected. Shrinks in the wash. Size up

Comfortable lounge set. Very soft material, perfect for lounging or traveling. Loose fit with elastic waistband. Top does not fit me as cropped as the product image does, but I prefer it that way. Wearing size small. (5'2 117 lbs.)

评论概述: Fantastic Black short top/ straight leg otfit outfit
评论详情: Extrmely well made  and the black color i wanted.  Wa surprised you changed me delivery charge when it was over $35. Because of that will in future look at other manufacturers as that is not their policy
I'm 4'11 the pants are a little short.

I love these and bought the rust (which is a salmon color), taupe, navy and black. They wash very well in cold water/hang dry. I do not put them in the dryer. At 5’2” and 147lbs, a medium fits perfectly. The top is a little boxy, but cute and long enough to not overwhelm my shortness. These will be cute to mix and match with my other clothes, but I usually just wear around the house. These were perfect for over the holidays.

评论概述: It’s cool for us short women
评论详情: I ordered this first in black, I’m 4”11, 187lbs (can’t believe I’m telling you this)… but it was SUPERCUTE. I went back and got other colors. The length was perfect, the fabric was breathable and just right for fall. If you’re having second thoughts…DON’T, get it. You won’t be disappointed.
Daughter loved it

Sizing is off. The cut of the pant seems off too. The pant has very wide legs but fits like a small in the hips. I've decided to keep it but it probably won't be a "go-to" in my closet, unfortunately.

评论概述: Very cute, pants are as shown.
评论详情: This outfit was very cute. The material is like any other sweats only elevated. I ended up returning it though because I felt like the pants were too short for what I am looking for. They are shorter than ankle length just like the picture.
I love this set bc it’s very comfortable and it’s true to size, I have no complaints to far. I decided to get more colors bc they match with anything. Recommend to anyone

I LOVE this set!! I was unsure when I first opened it, but it’s so comfy and cute!! It’s soft and warm, but I don’t get hot in it. It’s much better quality than I expected. I’m 5’5 and 145 lbs and got a size medium. I’m typically between a small and medium but I was aiming for comfort and a medium fits great. I wear it ALL the time! I’m planning on getting it in more colors!

Love this set! Was looking for something oversized and comfortable, but also trendy enough to wear out of the house to run errands. I am 6 months postpartum, and wanted something that didn't hug in all the wrong places. This set was perfect! The material is thick, but not overbearing. and the shirt is just cropped enough. Really love it and want to get in more colors! (for reference, I am 5'3, 160 pounds and the Large fits great!)

I am pleasantly surprised by the soft fabric and the way it hangs.  I've washed it in cold water and dried for about 10 minutes at low-delicate and it didn't shrink.  I'm 5'4" and the pants come to the top of my foot but don't touch the floor. Bought this in Rust size L so it fits loose, which I wanted.  Pants are slightly flared and have deep well-constructed pockets.
This is a nice lounge set for cooler days. I recommend going up a size if you want a loser fit.
I really like this set. I sized up and the bottoms are still a touch tight but overall great and comfy set.
It is gorgeous. However, it shrunk on the first wash.
It is very hard to find a decent fit when you’re short! And this fit perfectly. Also, the material is nice and thick not flimsy. But, don’t worry, Not too thick!!!

I am a S/M, but I like things like this to be bigger on me. I ordered a L because I heard it fits small. It fits as I expected, given that I ordered a size too big. However, I would say to size up. Other than that, it's cute. The pants are short, but not too short. I am about 5'6''.

I love this set!  Comfy and stylish.  Fit is true to size - I usually wear 10 short - ordered a large in navy blue.  love love love it.  I want to get another one in another color.  Perfect for running errands, working at home, hanging out with family.  You won't look like a slouch, but you will be super comfy!
This is a really nice quality set. The green is really pretty and they’re super comfy. Top runs a bit big but it looks good.
Love it! Bought another set in black. I’m 5’2” and 135 lbs and the small fit me perfect. Tempted to purchase more in other colors : )

评论概述: Pretty color and it doesn’t shrink
评论详情: I’m happy with this outfit. It’s very comfortable and I love the green color. No shrinking after washing and drying in the dryer.
Purchased for my wife and I should have purchased a huge lint roller.
Got this in rust grey and black. Can dress it up w jewelry and ready to go out. Comfy. Perfect for lounging at home. Bought 3!

This set is everything!! My favorite travel outfit. This rust color is perfect for fall. It is thick but isn’t lined with fleece. The cropped top is not too short. I’m able to dress this up or down and it was so affordable
I love this set! It is SO worth the price. It’s very soft, cute to dress up or down & feels like I’m wearing pajamas! 10/10 recommend! I’m wearing a medium and have a lot of room

I’m in love with the fit of this set. 5’4” 130lbs normally a small, but sized up to a medium. The waist is still a little trigger than I’d prefer but the large would probably be to big. The fit is so cute!
The fabric is nicer than I expected, it’s more of a soft sweater material. The pants are a little tight around the bum for those who are more curvy.

Very cute outfit! Great for lounging and travel. Its a good weight of material, thicker than I was expecting. Its also soft. Pants are short which work great for me since i'm short. Overall I would buy again. Definitely made for smaller waists though.

If you're tall, the top is VERY cropped. Maybe you're good with that. I'm just shy of 5'9 and it was way too short on me. The pants were cropped too, but I kind of liked the above the ankle length. The material was nice, though I felt the pockets were a bit bulky. Returned because the top was too short on me.

I don't ever leave reviews on Amazon but this is great quality. I'm usually a small in everything but I got a medium so there was no risk of it being tight. It's such a cute fit and it's nice thin (but good quality) material.
The outfit is so comfortable and stylish! Not too hot but cozy and warm. Very happy with the purchase and price.

评论概述: So comfy and perfect for a cold winter day!!
评论详情: This outfit is amazing!! Comfy and would be great for just lounging around the house, shopping, or having lunch with friends.  Next best thing to sweats but more versatile!
Love this set.  Super comfortable and better than I expected!  The pant length is perfect since I’m 5’4, fits right about ankle length.

评论概述: Comfy and cute but pants are a little short
评论详情: I’m 5’4 and the pants are too short

FINALLY, found casual wear, I have dreamed about. The right feel, comfortable fit, perfect length. Ordering another set, in white, (if available) TODAY! Note: I am 5’ 4” tall. 2nd photo taken after first hand wash. The suit held its color and shape. It feels like new. Ordering two more sets, today!
Love the ribbed design. I have a short torso and the pant and shirt length fiy perfectly for me. Cute and comfy. Purchased a second set after receiving the first one.
Lindo el diseño pero la calidad de la tela no, destiñe y le sale como pelusa

Cute. Good quality. Not thin. I am petite (5'1) and was concerned about length. The pants and sleeves are not too long.
Bought this outfit a few months ago. It fits well and the color is cute. Very comfortable.

评论概述: If you want comfy, this is for you!
评论详情: I bought this to travel in. It’s so comfy and relaxed. Feels like pajamas but pair it with with high top sneaks or a chunky boot and you’re good to go! Don’t miss out! Plenty of great colors to choose from!
Absolutely love this outfit.  So comfortable!  I got so many compliments.  Plan on ordering again in another color!

评论概述: Love it so much I bought two
评论详情: This jumpsuit was my go to all winter. Comfy, cozy, and a great length. I’m 5’1 and this fit perfectly with no need to alter. Loved it so much I bought it in black.

评论概述: My new favorite go to outfit
评论详情: I love this outfit and ordered it in different colors.
This set is amazing! Crop comes low enough to meet the high rise pants!
This is perfect to lounge in or go out for errands. I feel so put together in this!! Always get compliments.
The color and fabric were good.  The fit was better than expected.  Good product.
Weighed 140-ish (5’3) when I bought these. The medium fit perfectly! I bought quite a few of these and wear them almost every day. I can even dress them up and wear them out. Love these!
This is a nice set. I purchased it for lounge wear at home. It’s cute and comfortable. Quality is better than expected. I’m 5’1 and the pants are actually not super long so that’s a plus.

评论概述: Sized up, but my favorite set!!!
评论详情: Tried two sizes (normally a small, but ended up keeping the med). I LOVE this set! Ordered in two colors. I will be living in it all winter. Cute, comfy & flattering. I wear the sweater with a skirt for church-so cute. Very versatile!

评论概述: Wonderful, except waist elastic was too tight for me.
评论详情: I would keep it but the waist has a tight elastic band which makes it hard to breathe in. Love everything else about it.
Im 5’2” and ordered the small it fits perfect and cute, I ordered another one.
I love the style and thickness of the fabric, looks great on and perfect for my height. I’m a shorty!

Honestly, I didn’t have high hopes for this since it didn’t have many reviews, but it’s really good! Would totally pass for a set sold at Target. Material is nice, not to thick, but very study and the fit is really good! I ordered another color!
So soft, great fit

I don’t typically wear bright colors, so this purchase was a wildcard. I must say, I’m pleasantly surprised! This is perfect for lounging around my apartment and working from home. Definitely recommend!
10/10 love matching set serves wifey

评论详情: Love it and will order more. Very comfortable and fits true to size
I could live in this set. So comfy, warm and flattering. Perfect for in the house or on the go.  I’m 5’6” 150 lbs and ordered a large for a more oversized fit but could have gotten a medium.
I’m 5ft 113lbs. I got a small & the length is perfect. Wish they would offer more outfits in xs.
Loved everything about this set! The color is spot on. The material is awesome. I did size up for a looser fit and it is perfect. I will be living in this from now on
Feels so nice and is so comfortable… I love it!
Got this in the pink color and it’s perfect for around the house. I have worn it almost everyday since I got it. I did size up one and I think it’s perfect, not too tight.

LOVE THE OUTFIT-- SO COMFY LOOKS GREAT I GOT THE GREEN AND IT IS SO PRETTY. GOT MANY COMPLIMENTS AS WELL.

This outfit is so comfortable and beautiful
Love this! I’m 5’3 and the length was perfect. I ordered a large since the fit is supposed to be a bit oversized. I bought the set in 2 colors
This is so soft and comfortable.  Love it.
These fit as expected. They are short! I bought them for my 10 year old (about 4’11 height) and they were just right for her. She wants to wear them constantly. So comfy and cute!
I now have this in 4 different colors!! Every time I wear it I share the link with some stranger!! It washes great I feel cute and comfy in it. Great buy
